wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Percy Cookson (born 1891, date of death unknown) was a Welsh footballer. His regular position was as a defender. He was born in Bargoed. He played for Manchester United and Bargoed Town.

response: * Sam Cookson (English footballer) (1896–?), English footballer for Manchester City
* Sam Cookson (Welsh footballer) (1891–?), Welsh footballer for Manchester United
